item.title: Hugo Script Localserver
item.description: Pentru rulat Hugo in WSL (unde nu merge localhost:1313): 1 2 3 4 function hugo_server() { WSL2_IPADDRESS=$(ip addr show eth0 | grep "inet\b" | awk '{print $2}' | cut -d/ -f1) hugo server --bind $WSL2_IPADDRESS --baseURL=http://$WSL2_IPADDRESS -D -F --gc -w } Dupa rulezi direct hugo_server. IP-ul il iei din consola: 1 2 3 4 5 Environment: "development" Serving pages from memory Running in Fast Render Mode. For full rebuilds on change: hugo server --disableFastRender Web Server is available at http://172.
